title: Cheese and chutney strata
description: Layers of egg, goats’ cheese, bread and chutney come together in this classy American brunch recipe. Allow the strata to sit for 10 minutes before baking.
ingredients: 1 day-old French-style baguette, cut into 1cm/½ in rounds
350g/12oz soft goats’ cheese, torn into pieces
salt and freshly ground black pepper
